rejection.details:
Please note that you only have a limited amount of time should you choose to resubmit a petition with your full name. When Parliament is dissolved at 00.01am on Wednesday 3 May all parliamentary business – including petitions – will stop until the new Parliament returns. 

From 3 May, you won’t be able to sign or start petitions on this site. Petitions opened before 3 May will be available for people to read on the site. They will not be reopened after the election. You’ll need to start your petition again when the site reopens after the election.

We don’t know exactly when the site will open again. You can follow us on Twitter @HoCPetitions for updates, or check back on the petitions site for news if you prefer.
